class.name: OpenXRAndroidRaycastExtension
class.brief_description: Implements raycasting into the physical environment (using [code]XR_ANDROID_raycast[/code]).
class.description: Implements raycasting into the physical environment (using [code]XR_ANDROID_raycast[/code]).

method.name: is_raycast_supported
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if raycast is supported; otherwise [code]false[/code].

method.name: raycast
method.description: Performs a raycast against the [Array] of [enum TrackableType]s, from [param origin] in the direction of [param trajectory]. Returns an [Array] of up to [param max_results] [OpenXRAndroidHitResult]s.

constants.constant: One of the trackable types that can be provided in [method raycast], for raycasting real world planes (like ceilings, walls, tables, etc). For each [OpenXRAndroidHitResult] returned with this type, [method OpenXRAndroidHitResult.get_tracker] will return a [OpenXRAndroidTrackablePlaneTracker].

One of the trackable types that can be provided in [method raycast], for raycasting any solid real world surface. For each [OpenXRAndroidHitResult] returned with this type, [method OpenXRAndroidHitResult.get_tracker] will return null.
